tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE points_of_interest (
    poi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    poi_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE nearest_points (
    location_id INT,
    poi_id INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_poi FOREIGN KEY (poi_id) REFERENCES points_of_interest(poi_id)
);

CREATE TABLE points_of_interest (
  poi_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  poi_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  poi_category VARCHAR(50),
  latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  longitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE spatial_queries (
  query_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  query_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id),
  latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  longitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);
